body.p:
Macon Geo. August 29/65.
His Excellency --
Governor, State of Kentucky:

Sir: -- I respectfully ask to be appointed Commissioner for the State of Kentucky to take acknowledgement of deeds &c. &c. in the State of Georgia -- such officer being now needed in middle Ga. on the re-establishment of business relations between several states.

The applicant, R. S. Lanier, of Bibb County Georgia, is well known to me; is of good character, has taken the amnesty oath & is not, as I am well assured, embraced within any of the exception in the amnesty proclamation.

J Johnson
Pro Gov of Ga

Comr Deeds
R. S. Lanier
Georgia
comd
5 Sept/65
